Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes tiers of essential employees during a state of emergency
Summary: Establishes tiers of essential employees during a state of emergency; designates categories of employees in each tier.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing tiers of essential employees during a state of emergency
